attributes.action: The State Of Rail Travel In Lincolnshire
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition has started to highlight the shocking rail services that Lincolnshire has, and the fact that the Department For Transport must do a compleat review of services in the county as it is at a very low standard to the rest of the UK.

Lines Include :
Sheffield Midland - Cleethorpes via Gainsborough Central & Brigg  ( Saturday Only Service )

Sheffield Midland - Lincoln ( No Late Evening Trains & Sunday Service Starts At 2pm  )

Doncaster - Lincoln - Peterborough ( Part Daily Services and No Sunday or Late Night Services )

Grimsby - Newark.
Main problem here is frequency, some of the connections at Newark are very poor

Cleethorpes-Barton ( Service should run to Scunthorpe )
